TicTacToeView - Class in cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.views
This class is the view of our Extended TicTacToe game our view has a message area, and a list of buttons the buttons will be arranged in a ROWS_IN_BUTTON_PANEL x COLUMNS_IN_BUTTON_PANEL Grid Players will use the buttons to make their next move.
